titles.title: Supporting the designation of National Tourette Syndrome Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/20/2009--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of National Tourette Syndrome Day. Recognizes the accomplishments of those who work to increase awareness of Tourette Syndrome.
